answers.junior: try-with-resources automatically closes resources like files after use. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
answers.middle: try-with-resources ensures AutoCloseable resources are closed automatically. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Eliminates explicit finally blocks for resource cleanup.
answers.senior: Resources declared in try parentheses are closed in reverse order of declaration. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Handles suppressed exceptions from close() methods. Cleaner than manual cleanup.
answers.tricky: Discuss suppressed exceptions, custom AutoCloseable implementations, multiple resources, and close() order semantics. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
